result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert William Klubertanz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in custody.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states cases and parties state appearances.  Atty O'Rourke notes she and DE rec/rev revocation summary.  State states agreement.  Atty O'Rourke agrees.  DE makes statement.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in court with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amend to 947.01 domestic abuse related.  Attorney ORourke gives joint agreement.  State agrees.  Victim notification met.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 1: as amended.
18 months Probation, concurrent.
Undergo any counseling per agent.

Anger management and domestic abuse counseling.

Court denies request for bond modification.

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Linda A Hoffman appeared for State of Wisconsin.    Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State does not oppose signature bond.  Attorney ORourke request no violent/abusive contact.  State objects.   Time limits waived. $2500.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with J.G.  May return to premises to pick up personal property one time, with law enforcement and upon notice.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 23, 2014 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for June 3, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
